alert.note: Alert for Brown; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:01PM CDT until June 17 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Brown County in west central Texas... Coleman County in west central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Valera, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Coleman, Santa Anna and Trickham around 520 PM CDT. Bangs around 550 PM CDT. Burkett and Grosvenor around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mozelle, Fisk, Echo, Shields and Hords Creek Reservoir. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
